mapper.insert: insert into tb_delivery_fee( number, money, createtime, updatetime ) values ( #{number}, #{money}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update tb_delivery_fee set number = #{number}, money = #{money}, delivery_fee_id = delivery_fee_id where delivery_fee_id = #{delivery_fee_id}
mapper.select: select number, money, createtime, updatetime, delivery_fee_id from tb_delivery_fee where delivery_fee_id = #{delivery_fee_id}
select number, money, createtime, updatetime, delivery_fee_id from tb_delivery_fee order by number desc
